channel.title: DevCulture on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in DevCulture on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: Estimates are such a loaded and dangerous endeavor for an engineer. To the point where companies mistakenly talk about estimates like its a “skill” that an engineer can learn. But the reality is that if you can make a probabalistically accurate estimate, then its likely that the task should have been automated by some other means already. Dear Startup: You have no idea how much that costs. The problem http://kyleprifogle.
item.content:
Estimates are such a loaded and dangerous endeavor for an engineer. To the point where companies mistakenly talk about estimates like its a “skill” that an engineer can learn. But the reality is that if you can make a probabalistically accurate estimate, then its likely that the task should have been automated by some other means already.

Dear Startup: You have no idea how much that costs.
The problem
http://kyleprifogle.com |
